name: Anish Reddy
title: Applied AI/ML Engineer
summary: I'm an Applied AI/ML Engineer based in Waterloo, Canada. I specialize in building production-ready AI systems, from fine-tuning LLMs to deploying models on edge devices. I'm passionate about making AI accessible and practical.

highlights: Automated Root Cause Analysis with a Data Quality Agent, reducing manual investigation time by 30%
Deployed real-time anomaly detection and data quality dashboards
Developed Data Lineage System for enhanced governance
Built end-to-end AI advisor using Llama & Azure OpenAI for college program discovery
Created semantic search pipeline for 10,000+ programs using BERT embeddings, achieving 3x more relevant matches and 85% latency reduction
Fine-tuned dialogue model for microcontroller deployment
Optimized SLM using quantization & pruning, reducing inference latency by 80%
Built efficient inference pipeline for real-time conversational AI on embedded systems

projects.name: Typez
